meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kevin Shrum Adam Weissengruber Rebecca Wald Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7492.

td.p: Kevin Shrum, a retired adjunct professor from Fort Collins, Colorado
Adam Weissengruber, a librarian from Toronto, Ontario, Canada
Rebecca Wald, a psychologist from Baltimore, Maryland (whose 2-day cash winnings total $43,300)

tr.td: PRETTY COLORS
THE 20th CENTURY
PARTS OF THE WHOLE
MOVIE STARS
FOREIGN WORDS & PHRASES
"C" ALL THE ANIMALS
